DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , two arm study patient low-risk favorable intermediate-risk prostate cancer define 1.2016 NCCN criterion . Patients randomize either rectal spacer placement endorectal balloon placement , daily prior radiation treatment . 1 . Endorectal balloon ( ERB ) : Immobilization device manually place rectum prior radiation treatment plan CT daily treatment delivery , immobilize prostate reduce prostate motion . 2 . Rectal spacer ( RS ) : Biodegradable gel transperineally inject rectum prostate transrectal ultrasound guidance , increase physical distance thereby reduce radiation dose anterior rectal wall . The spacer begin biodegrade 2-3 month , fully absorb within 6 month . This study plan enroll total 40 patient accrual period 4 year .
